org.xadisk.connector.outbound
Interface XADiskConnectionFactory

All Superinterfaces:
Referenceable, Serializable
All Known Subinterfaces:
XADiskRemoteConnectionFactory
public interface XADiskConnectionFactory
extends Serializable, Referenceable

This interface is applicable only when invoking XADisk as a JCA Resource Adapter.

This interface represents a connection factory used by JavaEE applications to obtain connections to a native (running in the same JVM) XADisk instance.

Specifying name of this interface is normally required when creating a connection factory in a JavaEE server to connect to a native XADisk instance.

Since:
1.0

Method Summary

          Retrieves a new connection handle to interact with the target native XADisk instance.
